testCase.title: Complete operations within the 'Balances' page
prerequisites: Logged-in accounting/staff account with balance data available
steps: Delete incorrect or obsolete balance records (if permitted)
testCase.successCriteria: All operations complete successfully; displayed data remains accurate and synchronized; unauthorized actions are restricted; no logic, UI, or backend errors occur.

notes:
add balance button is not working

suggestion: try to put drop down in due date, status of the balance

search button is functioning but partially, since it is now showing properly the name of the searched name

suggestion is to delete the "showing page 1 of 7" etc
